experince.experience: It was nice to be a part of Scouting.Arranged camps,hikes and awareness rallies.
Learnt how to organize professional events and actvites, how to manage resources and make most out of everything.
Good to arrange Meet ups for professional skill development of fellow PACErs.
Good to arrange Meet ups for professional skill development of fellow PACErs.
A group of college students established a web solutions startup. Worked on an e-commerce project.
Developed a PHP, MySQL web application. Added a layer on top of Google maps for places and events.

• Involved in designing, developing features and parts of an App Distribution platform.
  • Majorly my work involves:
    • – Designing, writing and consuming HTTP-REST APIs.
    • – Setting up job queues for multiple monitoring tasks.
    • – Writing template code for full-stack Web and Desktop applications.
    • – Automating and setting up application build processes.
    • – Extensive research and POC creation of features,solutions for novel business requirements.
    • – Identifying bottlenecks across system and optimize database queries, page load time, serving time, build time.
  • Developed node-js, python back-end applications for automating and monitoring application build processes.
  • Developed node-js module for restructuring and renaming directory tree, handled resolution of interlinked file-paths in files.
  • Developed macOs desktop application(A Safari App Extension) using Swift for search monetization with app installer and app auto update feature from scratch

projects.shortInfo: Its a 3D animation video made using Blender Tool for spreading awareness regarding Traffic rules. Mini project for semester III.
C++ Qt Standalone Application keeps track of every patient and its visits. Data collected can be used for Projects of Data Mining and Machine Learning as data sets.
Simulation of college seat allocation process. Choice filling and Seat Allocation are performed. Modified Gayle-Shapely Algorithm implemented. Can be scaled using C++ CGI for deployment.
It's a web application developed using PHP , MySQL, Bootstrap, JavaScript etc. for conducting practical exams online.
It's a search engine made using Python, Beautifulsoup . Which crawls downloaded websites and indexes them. After one time indexing it delivers search results

Its a ready to use data structures and algorithms c++ template library.Many useful data structures and algorithms are implemented . One should just focus on his/her project necessity and dsalglib will take care of data structures and algorithms.

Choosing optimal location for business using data from social media websites contribute largely to the profit.Our System helps business choose optimal location for higher number of check-ins .indirectly helping businesses to increase their profits.We have used to machine learning techniques to help improve our system.

This is a simple flask web app implementation of a paper that I'm writing 'Making Sense of Numbers'. This paper proposes method for deriving inferences about prowessness of a stduent using attained graded.
Its a screen recorder written in python. It records the screen activities.I used PyAutoGUI and PIL modules for this.Audio capturing is yet to be added.

According to the requirements taken Developed a Digital Library Portal for College Library. All of the sections are dynamic and everything is editable using Admin Panel. Used Quill-Js for implementing Editor for Admin. PHP, MySQL is used.

Developed a Web Application using PHP and MongoDB for Book Bank Allotment done by AGCL library of WCE, Sangli. Automated process of Allocation, it was done manually and use to take almost 15-20 days for completion. Our system does it in a single day.

projects.projectTitle: Detection and Prevention of Black hole Attack in MANET
projects.shortInfo: It was a Team Project. We made changes in AODV protocol to simulate Black hole attack in Mobile and Adhoc Network​ and later implemented techniques for prevention of the Attack.

Developed a Web Application for Alumni Portal of Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya,Washim. It's developed using PHP, HTML, CSS,JavaScript, Bootstrap. All out of scratch. We used MySQL database . Alumni of JNV Washim have to register here with there details and we can searchfor Alumnus with filters.
A python app developed for scraping solutions from Sport Programming Websites and uploding them to Github.

summary:
Hello, I'm a Computer science enthusiast and B.E Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering graduate having a year of experience as Software Development Engineer in AI based industries.

I'm passionate about programming and delivering, clean, test-covered, well-designed and scalable code. I seek to learn and try to apply all of it in a way that makes life easier. I always try to design, develop and deliver technology solutions to problems around me.

I have strong hold on computer science fundamentals including Algorithms, Data structures, Operating Systems, Git and Computer Networking.
qoutes: Your death is something that happens to everyone else.
You only live as long as the last person who remembers you.
Every day every hour turn the pain into power.
If you cannot be a pencil to write someone's happiness, then try to be an erases to erase someone's sorrows.
helloText:
Dear Visitor, Thank you for visiting my webspace.

I'm working as Software Development Engineer at Hubino. I completed B.E Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering at Bannari amman Institute of Technology, Erode and my schooling from Jaycees school, Kangayam.

I do machine learning, deep learning and AI. I overwhelmingly like Python :)

How can I help you?
I can design, develop and deliver technological solutions to your problems.

Do we have something in common? If yes, let's have a talk about it and grow together.

We don't have anything in common?
That's fine,please introduce me something that I'm missing.
